title: Researchers Spot Surge in Erlang/OTP SSH RCE Exploits, 70% Target OT Firewalls
description: Malicious actors have been observed exploiting a now-patched critical security flaw impacting Erlang/Open Telecom Platform (OTP) SSH as early as beginning of May 2025, with about 70% of detections originating from firewalls protecting operational technology (OT) networks.
